attributes.action: make it law that all dogs should be kept on a suitable leash in public areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We hear of attacks on people and other animals, and it seems quite obvious to me that these cases would be far less if dogs were under control via a leash when out in public areas. It doesn't matter how well behaved your pet is - it only takes a second for it to be spooked by something, then it could get very serious. Is it really worth the risk?
